title: Psoriatic Disease: How to Slow Progression

content: Oct. 20, 2022 -- It can take years to get a psoriatic disease diagnosis, and no one knows that better than Katie Roberts,  who waited a decade for doctors to make the call. She shares her diagnosis story and talks about what it’s really like to live with psoriatic disease. We also hear from Elizabeth Ortiz, MD, about the importance of early diagnosis, and why finding the right treatment matters.
